name: inventree
tagline: An inventory management system for parts stock builds and suppliers
description: InvenTree is an open source inventory management system for manufacturing and electronics projects. It tracks parts, stock, suppliers, builds and BOMs, with granular locations and a modern web UI suited for labs, makerspaces and small companies.

features.title: Inventory Management
features.description: Provides a structured system for tracking parts components and finished items within an inventory

features.title: Bill of Materials
features.description: Defines relationships between components and assemblies to represent how products are built

features.title: Stock Tracking
features.description: Records stock quantities locations and movements over time

features.title: Supplier Management
features.description: Stores supplier information pricing and purchasing details

features.title: Build and Manufacturing Orders
features.description: Tracks production and assembly processes using build orders

features.title: Barcode Support
features.description: Supports barcode scanning for identifying parts and stock items

features.title: API Access
features.description: Allows external systems to interact with inventory data programmatically

features.title: Self-Hosted Inventory System
features.description: Runs the inventory platform on your own infrastructure
